metadata.title: EC-Council CND v3 CND Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Network Security Fundamentals (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Network Topologies is a key concept in Network Security Fundamentals. This domain covers topics essential for the EC-Council CND v3 exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with identify network components and their security implications. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any network security fundamentals task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Network Security Fundamentals is most closely related to apply the osi model and tcp/ip stack to security analysis?
options: Network Security Fundamentals governance and oversight
Network Security Fundamentals implementation and operations
Network Security Fundamentals assessment and testing
questions.explanation: Apply the OSI model and TCP/IP stack to security analysis falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Network Security Fundamentals.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Network Security Fundamentals (Domain 1)?

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when working with understand network security concepts and defense-in-depth strategy?
options: Following industry best practices and standards
Reducing the number of team members involved
questions.explanation: When working with understand network security concepts and defense-in-depth strategy, following industry best practices ensures consistent and reliable results.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of "Identify network components and their security implications" in Network Security Fundamentals?
options: To implement and manage identify network components and their security implications processes
To evaluate compliance with network security fundamentals standards
questions.explanation: Identify network components and their security implications is a key objective in Network Security Fundamentals. Understanding this concept is essential for the exam.
